about_the_game:
"

Devin Night Pack 169: Maze Masters

Mystify and surprise your groups on their next dungeon crawl with a carefully curated collection of Maze Masters! 34 familiar foes reside within, Gluttonous Goblins, towering Titans, and defiled dinosaurs.
